original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], [From.Reincarnation.GetTitledFirstName] reborn, is acting more like [From.GetPossPronoun] previous incarnation every day! [From.GetFirstName] is definitely expressing another of [From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]'s personality traits...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]，[From.Reincarnation.GetTitledFirstName]的转世，每天的行为举止与[From.GetPossPronoun]生前越来越相似！[From.GetFirstName]毫无疑问地又体现出了另一个[From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]的性格特点……

original: With a realm to rival that of Charlemagne, I could be recognized as his true successor and, invoking Translatio Imperii, have [Root.RelHead.GetBestName] crown me Emperor of a new Roman Empire in the west!
translation: 我拥有着堪比查理曼的领土，可以被视作他真正的继承者，援引皇权转移，让[Root.RelHead.GetBestName]加冕我为在西方的新罗马帝国皇帝！

original: Buddhism was founded by the Buddha, Siddhartha Gautama, in Northeast India in the 5th century BC. The religion flourished in India for more than 1500 years, building huge libraries and monastery complexes, until Muslim invasions and the growing power of the Brahmin caste drove Buddhism out of the subcontinent. In the game, Buddhists get a significant bonus to Learning, meaning that they will research technologies faster.
translation: 佛教是由佛陀——乔达摩悉达多在公元前五世纪创立于印度东北部的宗教。佛教在印度兴盛了 1500 余年，佛教徒建立了庞大的图书馆和修道院复合建筑物，直到因为穆斯林入侵和不断增长的婆罗门种姓的势力而离开印度次大陆。在游戏中，佛教徒将得到显著的学习属性奖励，这意味着他们的技术研究将更加快速。

original: Jainism is a religion of incredible antiquity, stemming from the ascetic Sramana tradition of India, in opposition to the priestly Brahmins and the caste system. The guiding principle of Jainism is Ahimsa - non-violence - which is more radically interpreted than in any other religion. In the game, Jains have a hard time waging offensive wars, but their remarkable tolerance means Jain rulers are well liked by all.
translation: 耆那教是不可思议的古代宗教，由印度的苦行沙门传统所产生，耆那教反对婆罗门祭司和种姓制度。耆那教的指导原则是不害主义 ——非暴力——并且比任何其他宗教都执行的更彻底。在游戏中，耆那教很难发动进攻性战争，但他们的非凡气度意味着耆那教的统治者更受到他人的喜欢。
他们正在准备针对我的冒险活动
他们正在准备针对我的侵略活动

original: The following adventurers are targeting me:\n$LIST$
translation: 以下是针对我的冒险活动：\n$LIST$

original: Revoke an honorary title previously awarded to a character
translation: 剥夺之前赐予某人的荣誉头衔

original: You can revoke honorary titles that you have awarded to characters, depriving them of the prestige and income from those titles.
translation: 你可以废除你之前赐予他人的荣誉头衔，剥夺他们从头衔获得的荣誉和收入。

original: Select an honorary title to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
translation: 选择一个要从§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!处剥夺的荣誉头衔

original: \nYou cannot create this retinue, you hold a temporary title.
translation: \n你不能创造此近卫军，因为你持有的是临时头衔。

original: You cannot play an Indian religion without the Rajas of India DLC
translation: 在没有印度罗阇DLC的情况下你不能选择印度宗教游玩

original: You cannot play a Jewish character without the Sons of Abraham DLC
translation: 在没有亚伯拉罕之裔DLC的情况下你不能选择信仰犹太教的角色进行游戏

original: Succession Law must be either Gavelkind, Primogeniture, Ultimogeniture or Open
translation: 继承法必须为均分继承法、长子继承法、幼子继承法和土耳其继承法中的一种

original: Heir Designation must obey the Succession Gender Law
translation: 继承人的指定必须遵循性别继承法

original: Is NOT a Former Lover of §Y$WHO$§!

A brilliant Turkish mercenary and former slave warrior by the name of Sabuktigin has distinguished himself many times, leading his company of horsemen in battle and raids. My commanders think I should give him a more prominent position.
translation: 一个杰出的突厥雇佣兵，曾经的奴隶勇士苏布克特勤率领他的骑兵军团进行了多次战斗与劫掠，由此闻名。我的指挥官认为我应该给予他一个更重要的职务。

original: A former Turkish mercenary and slave soldier is on the rise in the land of the Afghans. This Sabuktigin, a zealous man who loathes infidels, seems intent on creating an empire to rival that of the Caliphs of old, as he has just finished crushing [FromFrom.GetTitledName] in a brutal war. Tens of thousands of fierce tribesmen have gathered under his banner!
translation: 一个前突厥雇佣兵、奴隶勇士，在阿富汗人的土地上崛起。苏布克特勤，一个憎恶异教徒的虔信者，致力于建立一个堪比古时哈里发的帝国，他刚刚在一次残忍的战争中击垮了[FromFrom.GetTitledName]。数以万计的凶悍部落青年聚集到了他的军旗之下！

original: What a troubled region that is...
I went to [From.GetFirstName]'s chamber and gave [From.GetHerHim] a good tumble!
translation: 我去了[From.GetFirstName]的房间并且跟[From.GetHerHim]进行了一番深入交流！

original: The three great branches of Buddhism are Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. You have decided to look for a new philosophy, but which one shall it be?
translation: 佛教的三个主要分支为大乘佛教、金刚乘佛教和上座部佛教。你决定寻求一种新的哲学，你想选择哪一个？

original: The moral authority of a religion affects the conversion chances of characters and counties and the susceptibility to heresies. A low authority value can prevent the chief pontiff from performing special actions like excommunication. It may also cause instability with various negative events in your realm as the religious institutions lose their grip on the populace.
translation: 一个宗教的宗教权威影响着传教成功率以及异教对该宗教的好感。宗教权威较低时宗教领袖无法进行特殊行动，比如绝罚。由于宗教机构失去了民心，低宗教权威还会触发诸多负面事件，使得你的国家不再稳定。

original: Hire §Y$TITLE$§W for §Y$COST$§W $PIETYNAME$. (They will arrive in or nearby §Y$CAPITAL$§W.)
translation: 雇佣§Y$TITLE$§!需要花费§Y$COST$§!$PIETYNAME$。（他们会抵达§Y$CAPITAL$§!或者其周边地区。）

original: I can drive the Jomsvikings from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我能把约姆斯维京人从我的领地赶走并夺取他们的城堡。然而，这么做是非常不虔诚的……
